Text: Thank you very much for the avi files. I cannot watch the x264 files on my powerbook without converting them & that takes too long. Without you, I would not be enjoying these TV shows.
Thanks heaps for the AVI files can you please tell me why all of a sudden it almost impossible to get them everyone seems to be uploading in other formats. Great Work

Hi Lee1237,
Smaller file sizes & better quality for Windows users from what I understand, but not so good for us Mac users.
Thanks adamMR I thought that might be what it was but what about those that want to burn it to a DVD and what it on TV and cant use the other formats.

Thanks for the avi :-D.  

Many DVD players cannot playback the mp4 and mkv files either.  Watching TV series on the PC is not option at my house.  That's just geeky...
We don't have cable or satellite so I download the shows we like. We watch them on our TV hooked up to the computer. The picture & sound quality is very good.
Are you Mac users stupid?? x264 on mac only if converted?? Check this brand new (LOL) software for pc and mac...www.videolan.org

haze82,
VLC is the only player I have ever used & I have tried all the codecs, versions etc. It has to do with my system (2003 PowerPC G4). 
One of these years I will have to upgrade. Until then... thanks for the AVIs.
